explanation: [0-0] On a boxing ring with grey fences and a grey floor marked with black and blue lines, two boxers are standing. The boxer on the right wearing gold shorts takes an attacking stance, while the boxer on the left holds his hands in front of his head in a defensive posture. The background is black, and the audience is seated below the stage.

[0-4] Then, the boxer in the gold shorts on the right shuffles his feet on the stage, followed by raising his left leg and both arms. A yellow circle appears on his left knee, while the white English subtitle "FAKES" appears and disappears on the screen. Subsequently, the boxer in the gold shorts steps on the stage with his left foot, and the boxer in the yellow shorts on the left leans back slightly, swings his arms, and kicks his right leg to the right. At the same time, the boxer in the gold shorts on the right uses his right arm to hug the right leg of the boxer in the yellow shorts on the left. A yellow circle appears at the point of contact between the two boxers on the right side of the screen, and the white English subtitle "CATCHES KICK" appears and moves down before disappearing. Then, another yellow circle and the white English subtitle "COUNTER RIGHT" appear and move to the left before disappearing. Meanwhile, the boxer in the gold shorts on the right holds the right leg of the boxer in the yellow shorts on the left with his left hand, and punches the boxer in the yellow shorts on the left with his right hand. The boxer in the yellow shorts protects his head with both hands. The bald referee in black clothes stands next to the two boxers, his face serious, paying close attention to the situation of the boxers.

[4-8] Immediately afterward, the boxer in the gold shorts on the right extends his left leg to the left, tripping the supporting left leg of the boxer in the yellow shorts with his left foot, causing the boxer in the yellow shorts on the left to lose his balance. At the same time, a yellow circle and the white English subtitle "SWEEP" appear on the right side of the screen, move to the left, and then disappear. The boxer in the yellow shorts falls on the stage and then quickly gets up. The referee in black clothes walks between the two boxers and waves his hands.
